NG0322:2: da ki ma ha karma ta twa tri sa ma dza na ma tan+t+ra /
NG0322:4: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma de kho na nyid gsum du 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
NG0322:5: bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0322:6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
NG0322:7: ri rab ri'i rtse mo byang shar gyi mtshams shing yongs 'du'i tshal chen po na /
NG0322:8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
NG0322:9: dang thugs kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na
NG0322:10: rdo rje la / 'khor lha ma srin sde brgyad la sogs pa /
NG0322:11: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs bye ba dung phyur kyis bskor te bzhugs so //
NG0322:12: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje
NG0322:13: la 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis phyi nang gsang ba'i
NG0322:15: karma da kis 'di skad zhus so //
NG0322:16: stobs chen drag po 'joms mdzad rdo rje can //
NG0322:17: bcud kyis bsdus pa'i 'gro ba bdag la sogs //
NG0322:18: bstan pa 'di la skye ba ci ltar smin //
NG0322:19: ye shes sprul pas rang rgyud grub pa @#//
NG0322:21: de bzhin rigs dang nges tshig ci ltar lags /
NG0322:22: khyed kyis bka' stsol bdag cag nyan par 'tshal //
NG0322:23: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rjes pad+ma'i gdan las bzhengs te bka' stsal pa /
NG0322:24: 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba'i sngon rol du /
NG0322:25: bcud ni bskal pa'i rnam pa'i grangs kyis 'grub //
NG0322:26: lus med shes pa chang sbrang bzhin du gnas //
NG0322:27: 'jig chags gnyis kyis stongs nas bskal pa las //
NG0322:28: dus gcig tsha grang rlung 'thabs 'bras bur smin /
NG0322:29: de min spyi mthun las kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:30: lus la blta bas mi ngoms spyan gsum ma //
NG0322:31: mche gtsigs gcong rong chags pa'i gdung ba g.yos //
NG0322:32: phyag gis b+ha ga bsgrad pa rlung gis bskyod //
NG0322:33: 'byung bzhi 'dus pa rgyu dang rkyen du 'phrad //
NG0322:34: 'gro drug ma bu til gang bzhin du smin //
NG0322:35: de min 'byung ba 'dus pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:36: yum chen mo las brdzus te skyes pa lnga //
NG0322:37: dbugs dang drod dang khrag dang sha rus las //
NG0322:38: rlung gi rgyal mo 'jig rten 'degs byed ma //
NG0322:39: drod kyi rgyal mo 'jig rten sreg byed ma //
NG0322:40: rlan gyi rgyal mo 'jig rten sdud byed ma //
NG0322:41: sa yi rgyal mos 'jig rten rten par byed //
NG0322:42: 'jig rten kun khyab rgyu ba'i rang bzhin las //
NG0322:43: spyi mthun srid pa chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:44: mkha' 'gro de rnams nus pa'i mthu skyes pas //
NG0322:45: 'od kyis so so'i 'jig rten gang bar gyur //
NG0322:46: so so'i nus mthus 'jig rten dbang du 'dod //
NG0322:47: 'byung ba mi mthun rigs lnga'i ngo bo las //
NG0322:48: sprul pa'i yum gyis 'byung ba cha snyoms te //
NG0322:49: 'jig rten rgyu ba'i rang bzhin las //
NG0322:50: srid pa cha snyoms byed mkhan mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:51: gzhan yang 'byung ba chen po lnga rnams kyis //
NG0322:52: so so rang gi lus las mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:53: rang lus 'dzin pa rtsi thog bzhin du skyes //
NG0322:54: 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:55: zhal dang mig dang rna ba las ni skyes //
NG0322:56: ma rgyud thams cad mngal nas rab tu skyes //
NG0322:57: bdud dang gshin rje srin po dbugs las skyes //
NG0322:58: bgegs rigs stong phrag drug cu brdzus las skyes //
NG0322:59: mkha' 'gro ma de rnams kyi lus la yang *//
NG0322:60: skyes pa mang zhing srid pa 'di lta ste //
NG0322:61: lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:62: srin po sha za gshin rje mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:63: dri za mkha' lding mi'am ci mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:64: lho 'phye drang srong srog gi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:65: bdud dang dur khrod mi yi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:66: byol song yi dwags dmyal ba'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:67: las dang rab tu dmyal ba la sogs te //
NG0322:68: mkha' 'gro ma rigs thams cad gcig la gcig / yid du mi 'ong khro zhing 'khrug pa ni //
NG0322:69: spyi mthun so so'i las kyi dbang nyid kyis //
NG0322:70: nying sha nying khrag pags pa srog la spyod //
NG0322:71: 'jigs skrag 'dod pa la sogs tha dad pas //
NG0322:74: gab gsod sha za khrag 'thung 'o dod 'bod //
NG0322:75: mi bzod ngu ba mgo lus thang la rdeb //
NG0322:76: rtsal dang ldan pa rgod cing thal mo rdeb //
NG0322:77: mi mthun mgo brnyan lus ni sna tshogs te //
NG0322:78: mi lus bya gshog mig gsum sder mo can //
NG0322:79: mche ba rwa can lus gcig mgo mang dang *//
NG0322:80: mdzes 'od 'bar ba mi sdug sna tshogs rnams //
NG0322:81: sdug bsngal mang po'i tshogs kyis gdungs pa la //
NG0322:82: thabs las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro ma chen gcig / gzhan las 'phags shing mthu rtsal che ba yis //
NG0322:83: mi bzod sdug bsngal skad cig bder mdzad pas //
NG0322:84: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro 'dus te phyogs gcig nas //
NG0322:85: spyi mthun las kyi mkha' 'gro ma nyid la //
NG0322:86: zhu ba'i tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to /
NG0322:87: kha dog dbyibs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:88: bdag cag las dang rgyu 'bras ni //
NG0322:89: gang yin rigs dang rigs kyi gtso mo gang *//
NG0322:90: yul dang las dang zas dang skal ba gang *//
NG0322:92: yum chen mo de shin tu chags pas gdung ba'i sems g.yos par gyur te /
NG0322:93: sems rtse gcig tu sbyor ba'i grogs gcig bsgoms pa'i
NG0322:94: 'bras bu stag gi lo'i dpyid zla ra ba la
NG0322:95: / 'jig rten yum gcig ming dgu'i rmi lam du /
NG0322:96: mi nag lus bongs ri rab tsam //
NG0322:97: dbu gsum mdzes pa'i phyag drug gshog par ldan //
NG0322:98: 'jigs pa'i nga ros lag pa sar brdabs pas //
NG0322:99: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams brgyal zhing snying khrag skyugs //
NG0322:100: sangs rgyas mgo bcad 'jigs pa'i rgyan mnga' bas //
NG0322:101: bde ba'i chags pa mngon gsum spyad pa rmis //
NG0322:102: lhums pa der gnas de phyi de lo dus su //
NG0322:103: srin po lcam dral gnyis skyes par gyur te /
NG0322:104: dral po rmi lam dang ni mthun par skyes //
NG0322:105: de nas ra la ra la ru lu ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo'i sgra byung bas /
NG0322:106: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad shing lo rlung gis bdas
NG0322:107: pa bzhin du 'dus te dbang phyug chen po lcam
NG0322:108: dral bdag cag gi gtso bo gtso mo mdzod cig
NG0322:110: de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs thams cad kyis /
NG0322:111: dgung dang nam phyed tho rangs snga dro ru //
NG0322:112: nyi khri chig stong res mchod pa byed do //
NG0322:115: sarba dak+ki a kad+d+ha ya a kad+d+ha ya /
NG0322:116: nirma na a bra me ya /
NG0322:117: a dzi te na karma sa ru /
NG0322:118: sa ma dza sa ma dza /
NG0322:120: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad srog rang dbang med par 'dus te /
NG0322:121: mchod nas srog gi snying po phul ba /
NG0322:122: ma rag sha kha mun dza /
NG0322:123: trag rak+sha snying kha rag ma badzra dun ting */
NG0322:124: rag mo yag mo ma ra na b+h+yo //
NG0322:125: dak+ki ni de wa a su ra na ga yag
NG0322:126: sha rag sha bi tsa sha ng+h+rish+tha rash+ta ga ru
NG0322:127: da kin+na ra ma ho ra ga ag ni ba
NG0322:128: ru na / ru tra ba ti /
NG0322:129: gan+d+har+b+ha tir+ya ka pre ta ka na raka karma na
NG0322:130: ra ka sarba dak+ki ba ta la ba la ba
NG0322:131: si / sarba dak+ki a nan ta ri ba tsa ra /
NG0322:132: sarba dak+ki ni b+h+yo b+hu ma ta b+h+yo b+h+yo ru ru /
NG0322:134: he ru ka che ba'i nga @#//
NG0322:136: 'jig rten du ha ha hi hi zhes brjod pas /
NG0322:137: snod bcud thams cad g.yo zhing 'khrugs te /
NG0322:138: 'og min gyi gnas na de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang ldeg ldeg 'gul lo //
NG0322:139: bde gshegs thugs khros brdas mtshon bka' bgros mdzad //
NG0322:140: gdul thabs rnam gnyis bka' mthun stangs gcod pas //
NG0322:141: srid ma'i rgyal mo kro ti shwa ris gzigs //
NG0322:142: trang ma trang ru trang a' gad+d+ha ya a gang+ng+ha ya /
NG0322:143: ta tha ya ta tha ya /
NG0322:144: ra la ra la b+h+yo ru lu ru lu b+h+yo //
NG0322:146: kro ta kro ti ru ti /
NG0322:147: sa ma ban dam ku ru zhes brjod pas /
NG0322:148: bdud dang khro bo khro mo yab yum gyi tshogs thams cad sil gyis lhags par gyur to //
NG0322:149: yum chen mo de'i zhal nas 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po /
NG0322:150: 'og min gyi gnas na dpal chen po rdzu 'phrul
NG0322:151: chen po ye shes kyi rtsal dang ldan pa zhig
NG0322:152: yod / 'khor mkha' 'gro ma dang khro bo thams cad kyis phyogs mtshams chod cig par bsgo'o //
NG0322:153: 'jig rten dbang phyug rab tu bred par gyur /
NG0322:154: shin tu sngangs pas rang gi gnas su phyin nas /
NG0322:155: keng rus thod mkhar gsum thog brtsigs pa'i steng *//
NG0322:156: b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas dur khrod 'jigs pas brgyan //
NG0322:157: rta babs mu khyud lcags ri me 'obs byas //
NG0322:158: rnag khrag bshang gci klad pa dri chen dang *//
NG0322:159: bam rul zag pa mnam zhing dku ba dang *//
NG0322:160: mi gtsang rnam pa sna tshogs pas bskor ro //
NG0322:161: phyi rim dur khrod ma brgyad bka' nyan dang *//
NG0322:162: rim pas 'jigs byed khro bo bcu yis bskor //
NG0322:163: srid pa'i phur bu dpag chen mda' bzhin 'phen //
NG0322:164: de yi phyi rim dbang phyug ma yis bskor //
NG0322:165: gzhan yang ral pa can gyi tshogs rnams dang *//
NG0322:166: mche ba gshog pa nu ma sder mo can //
NG0322:167: mgo brnyan ma tshogs sna tshogs pas bskor ro //
NG0322:168: dpal chen po dang nor gyis dogs pas ni //
NG0322:169: brda' ni rnam drug byed cing 'bod pa ste //
NG0322:170: spyugs la g.yab mo thal mo se gol dang *//
NG0322:171: rkun po glu ste so sos go bar byas //
NG0322:172: 'ja' dang 'brug glog stong gi sgra 'byin zhing *//
NG0322:173: 'bru dang rin chen sna tshogs sman dang chu //
NG0322:174: 'gro drug mkha' 'gro sha rus za ba rnams /
NG0322:175: kha nas nad kyi rnam pa sna tshogs skyugs //
NG0322:176: kun nas bskor te btsan par byas pa yis //
NG0322:177: bdud kyi sems de rab tu der gnas pas //
NG0322:178: ma trang ru tras dpal la skur pa btab //
NG0322:179: dpal chen bya ba med par nges pa las //
NG0322:180: srid pa'i rgyal mos btses pa 'dra zer ro //
NG0322:181: 'og min gnas nas dpal gyis dgongs pa mdzad //
NG0322:182: ci phyir nyon mongs de dang sems can rnams //
NG0322:183: thugs rje'i zhing du gyur pas sgrol du gshegs //
NG0322:184: mthong ba'i logs su lha yi gzhal yas sprul //
NG0322:185: srin po'i rnam shes mdzes shing 'dzin par byas //
NG0322:186: srin po chags skyas 'khor la gdams ngag byas //
NG0322:187: dpal gyi srin po'i lus kyis gnas su phyin //
NG0322:191: rwa gzengs mig bgrad mche gtsigs sder mo gdengs //
NG0322:192: 'jigs pa'i skad kyis co long chen po 'byin /
NG0322:193: kha nas khrag dang nad skyugs 'di skad zer //
NG0322:194: gtso bo rje bo lags sam gsang brda' ston //
NG0322:195: dpal gyis so so'i brda' rnams nges bstan pas //
NG0322:196: dngos nyid yin par mthong ste mchod pa phul //
NG0322:197: gzhal yas nang du byon te kha t+wam gdengs //
NG0322:198: srin mo kro ti shwa ri cir gyis bzung *//
NG0322:199: bsgral bar byas nas rang rtags snying po phul //
NG0322:200: bka' la btags te kha t+wam spu gri byin //
NG0322:201: ma mo'i gtso mo sbyor ba'i yum du byas //
NG0322:202: dpal gyi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas yul las //
NG0322:203: sprul pa kau ri seng ha khro mo drag po'i tshogs //
NG0322:204: dur khrod pho nya phyogs skyong la sogs kun //
NG0322:205: rang rang 'dra ba'i sprul pa mang pos btul //
NG0322:206: kun gyis mgrin gcig dpal la 'di skad zhus //
NG0322:207: bdud kyi bdud rje thugs rje'i bdag po khyod //
NG0322:208: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa 'bangs su mchi //
NG0322:209: zhes srog gi snying po phul nas /
NG0322:210: tha tshig blangs te dkyil 'khor bran la gnas par byas so //
NG0322:211: de yi 'khor rnams sngar 'dus gzhal yas med //
NG0322:212: srin po gzhal yas med pas sdangs par gyur //
NG0322:213: sangs rgyas cho 'phrul yin par rab tu shes //
NG0322:214: rang gi gnas su rgyug pas dpal dang 'phrad //
NG0322:215: mthong thos 'jigs pa chen po rab tu skyes //
NG0322:216: dpal gyi tsham rngams brtul zhugs spyod pa mdzad //
NG0322:217: dzahhum bam hoh'i phyag rgya bzhi yis bzung *//
NG0322:218: sgrol sngags kha t+wam srin po'i snying gar brgyab //
NG0322:219: mgo bo lho nub rkang pa byang shar bstan //
NG0322:220: sha rus khrag la rol pa chen por mdzad //
NG0322:221: ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyang rol du bcug / dbang po rnam lnga ye shes khrag 'thung rdzas /
NG0322:222: khog par zhugs nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed //
NG0322:223: dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar bar byin gyis brlabs //
NG0322:224: bdud sde ldang ba med par bya ba'i phyir //
NG0322:225: gnas chen brgyad du mchod rten re re brtsig / dur khrod ma brgyad bka' nyan bcas pas bsrung *//
NG0322:226: rigs lnga ye shes chos dang rang bzhin las las skyes //
NG0322:227: rdo rje mkha' 'gro shugs kyi mkha' 'gro yang *//
NG0322:228: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:229: re re la'ang bzhi bzhi bcu drug ye shes mnga' //
NG0322:230: dur khrod kau ri seng ha bcu drug grub pa'i rigs //
NG0322:231: a phyi sham sham man chad sman mo'i rigs //
NG0322:232: nges pa'i tshig ni rgyu las ma byung rang bzhin lhun gyis grub //
NG0322:233: thugs rje nyi ma lta bur yongs la khyab //
NG0322:234: don dam skye med 'khor ba'i bdud las rgyal //
NG0322:235: rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ye shes ma ru bstan //
NG0322:236: srid pa nyon mongs rgyu mthun srin po'i 'khor //
NG0322:237: chags pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal sna tshogs spyad //
NG0322:238: sngon spyad nyon mongs zad pas dpal chen gzhal yang mthong *//
NG0322:239: dgos don ci 'dod sgrubs pas grub pa mo //
NG0322:241: kyis chos nyid don mi rtog / nyon mongs stug pos bde gshegs zhal ma thong *//
NG0322:242: bdag tu rtog pas 'khor ba dug gsum rgyas //
NG0322:243: rang bzhin mthu bltas srid pa'i sman mor grags //
NG0322:244: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mo'i rgyud las /
NG0322:245: skye rgyud gyi gleng gzhi rigs dang nges tshig bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o ///
NG0322:246: / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
NG0322:247: bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa rgya chen po mchod nas /
NG0322:249: mthu chen rdzu 'phrul 'gro skyabs thugs rje can //
NG0322:250: 'jig rten dbang chen mkha' 'gro 'di dag rnams //
NG0322:251: sgrub thabs gnas dang dam rdzas bkol thabs rnams //
NG0322:252: 'gro rnams gnyis po don phyir bdag gis zhu //
NG0322:253: kun mkhyen rig pa'i rtsal chen khyod kyis gsung *//
NG0322:257: gtso mo bsgrub pa'i rim pa bsdus pa'i don //
NG0322:258: gzhan gsal med pas bdag gis 'dir bshad bya //
NG0322:259: skye med chos rnams nam mkha' lta bu las //
NG0322:260: dbang chen 'byung ba yum gyi ngo bor brtsegs //
NG0322:261: keng rus ri rab b+han ng+ha'i gzhal yas khang *//
NG0322:262: nang du tsakra rtsibs bzhi ro yi steng *//
NG0322:263: man ngag rim pas mkha' 'gro lnga ru bskyed /
NG0322:264: kha dog dbyibs ni rigs dang mthun pa las //
NG0322:265: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum dur khrod rgyan //
NG0322:266: dbus shar lho phyogs phyag g.yas ka pa la //
NG0322:267: nub byang gnyis g.yas tsit+ta thod pa bsnams //
NG0322:268: g.yang gzhi sbrul zhags dgra s+t+wa zhags pa thod //
NG0322:269: g.yon pa'i phyag ni lnga ste thegs par bsam //
NG0322:270: rtse gcig dbang po gang dang gang spyod yul //
NG0322:271: bsgom na de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro //
NG0322:272: mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor pas mi bya //
NG0322:273: chos can med phyir chos nyid yod ma yin //
NG0322:274: brag cha'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'i chos 'di bstan //
NG0322:275: bsam pa po med bsam pa'i chos kyang med //
NG0322:276: sngags dang lha med spros med rang bzhin las //
NG0322:277: 'khrul rtog spros pa'i rang bzhin ci yang snang *//
NG0322:278: ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i lung gsum las //
NG0322:279: gnas dang rgyu rtsis dus tshod gtsug lag rgyud //
NG0322:280: mthu 'phrog las bcol dngos grub mngon bkol rgyud //
NG0322:281: sgrub rdzas gsang tshig thugs kyi sgrom bu'i rgyud //
NG0322:282: de gsum 'dus pa'i don ni 'di lta ste //
NG0322:283: rigs dang grangs dang don kyi ngo bo ste //
NG0322:284: las yul rgyu srang 'dun pa gar rgyu'i phyogs //
NG0322:285: dam rdzas sngags las dus tshod myur 'grub thabs //
NG0322:286: rdzu 'phrul sgrib shing 'khrugs nyams chad la sogs //
NG0322:287: don sngags lan cig phyir ni rtsis rgyud yin //
NG0322:289: lha'i dbang pos yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0322:290: kun mkhyen don rnams 'byed pa shes rab bdag / 'gro drug bdag cag rmongs pa'i don slad du //
NG0322:291: bsdus don re re nas ni bshad par zhu //
NG0322:295: bsdus don re re la yang gnyis gnyis te //
NG0322:296: bka' dang rang bzhin gnyis su shes par bya //
NG0322:297: ye shes chos las skye ba'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:298: rdo rje mkha' 'gro shugs kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:299: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:300: rang bzhin rigs las tha dad gcig gnas pa //
NG0322:301: spyir ni mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro las kyi 'gro //
NG0322:302: de gsum dag tu thams cad 'dus pa yin //
NG0322:303: de las las kyi mkha' 'gro bzhi yod de //
NG0322:304: gral rgyug dgon pa gnas 'khyar chad pas phog / gral rgyug bcu drug dgon pa dur khrod gnas //
NG0322:305: gnas 'khyar chad pas phog pa 'di 'dra ste //
NG0322:306: gnas 'khyar 'gro ba rigs drug yod pa las //
NG0322:307: mi dang byol song gnyis la brtag pa ni //
NG0322:308: skra dang dpral ba mig gnyis dang *//
NG0322:309: sen mo lus kyi dri ma mo mtshan rtags //
NG0322:310: rmen sgrub 'khyil pa kha brag che //
NG0322:311: mgo mjug log dang lcags kyu bshul ba rnams //
NG0322:312: 'di dag mi la yod de nus mthu che //
NG0322:313: mkha' lding 'khor ba bya yi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:314: smra nyan kha dog ston pa khyi yi mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:315: mthong mang sgra snyan 'byin pa sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:316: bying rmugs mi dga' 'phyo zhing 'gro snying 'dod //
NG0322:317: 'di dag nyams len bar chod mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:318: chad pas phog pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste //
NG0322:319: spyang gdong mig rtsa dmar la mchi ris yod //
NG0322:320: skad chung co long gzhan rnams sngangs par nus //
NG0322:321: dred 'dra lus po kham nag yan lag ring *//
NG0322:322: spre'u gzugs kha dmar lce ring bya byed mang *//
NG0322:323: stag 'dra ngo dmar sha khrag dmar la dga' //
NG0322:324: gzugs chung pha wang mtshan ngan mig rtsa dmar //
NG0322:325: sen mo khwa 'dra sor mo ring la phra //
NG0322:326: chad skod rdu du yang tshul mthun 'jug spyod pa byed //
NG0322:327: dus ma yin pas spel zhing bde ba yod //
NG0322:328: ngo bo srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can rnams //
NG0322:329: lus bor shes pa nam mkhar las kyis 'gro //
NG0322:330: las ni phyi nang gnyis su shes par bya //
NG0322:331: byi li las la g.yel ba bzhi yod de //
NG0322:332: srid pa chags 'jig bskal pa dang po'i las //
NG0322:333: nam zla dus bzhi 'byung ba bzhi yi las //
NG0322:334: dgun 'khyags dpyid 'ju dbyar skye ston smin no //
NG0322:335: 'byung ba chen po bzhi yi las rnams la //
NG0322:336: sra byed sa ste rlan byed chu //
NG0322:337: tsha byed me la g.yo byed rlung *//
NG0322:338: nang gi las la dbye ba gnyis yod de //
NG0322:339: skye bar byed dang 'chi bar byed //
NG0322:340: skyer mi ster dang mod la skye //
NG0322:341: mod la 'chi dang mchir mi ster //
NG0322:342: sa g.yos 'gul dang sa rdol thog ser dang *//
NG0322:343: skar mda' ko rdung la sogs rang bzhin las //
NG0322:344: yul ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro sha sar gnas //
NG0322:345: shugs kyi mkha' 'gro khrag dang chu la gnas //
NG0322:346: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro drod dang me la gnas //
NG0322:347: las kyi mkha' 'gro dbugs dang rlung la gnas //
NG0322:348: yum chen brgyad na 'bum sde re re gnas //
NG0322:349: pho nya nag mo byang shar mtshams na @#//
NG0322:351: 'dzam bu gling na nyi khri chig stong gnas //
NG0322:352: ri nag phog chad mtshe'u bdun na yod //
NG0322:353: bdud kyi rigs rnams de lta bu la gnas //
NG0322:354: ri mdog dmar po sha sho bzhin mi sdug / srin po'i rigs kyi mkha' 'gro gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:355: sa gzhi tsha sgor dmyal ba'i chu khol ba //
NG0322:356: las kyi gshin rje la sogs gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:357: chu srin kha 'dra shing gcig chu sna 'thab //
NG0322:358: der ni gnod sbyin drag po gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:359: shing rigs chu mig mang po yod pa ni //
NG0322:360: klu rigs mang po de la gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:361: ri rtse thang dmar shing rigs 'ga' skyes pa //
NG0322:362: gdug pa klu rigs gdol pa gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:363: de'u mkhar rnying rgyal po gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:364: ri brag sa ni mi 'dra mtshan ma can //
NG0322:365: btsan btsun dmu bdud skya rengs gnas pa'i sa //
NG0322:366: dben sa re'u rul dgon shul dang *//
NG0322:367: sa phug ri phug rnying pa dang *//
NG0322:368: lam mdo chu gling tshugs pa dang *//
NG0322:369: grog po gting zab dur khrod dag / sman mo nag mo gnas pa'i sa'o //
NG0322:370: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang sa //
NG0322:371: shugs kyi mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang chu //
NG0322:372: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang me //
NG0322:373: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang rlung *//
NG0322:374: dgun zla gsum la rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:375: dpyid zla gsum la shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:376: dbyar zla gsum la chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:377: ston zla gsum la las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:378: re re la yang rgyu rtsis bzhi bzhi ste //
NG0322:379: gcig nas bdun du rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:380: dgu nas bcu bzhi shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:381: bcu drug nyi shu gnyis su chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:382: nyer gsum dgu la thub pa las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:383: de bzhin kun la so sor sbyar bar bya //
NG0322:384: srod dang snga dro rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:385: dros chen dros yol shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:386: nyin mtshan phyed yol chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:387: dgongs dang tho rangs las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:388: nya stong brgyad la kun ka khrugs re rgyu //
NG0322:389: ting 'dzin drod nyul nyi shu dgu la rgyu //
NG0322:390: de nyid rnal 'byor yum ni mtshan mo rgyu //
NG0322:391: tshogs kyi phud nyul nyin mo rgyu //
NG0322:392: dgon pa'i mkha' 'gro kun tu rgyu //
NG0322:393: nam langs nyi nub nyi ma rgyu //
NG0322:394: rtse srod bdun sros zla ba rgyu //
NG0322:395: sngo dro srod la dmag dpon rgyu //
NG0322:396: nying dgung nam dgung lhag pa rgyu //
NG0322:397: gung gnyis yol ba phur bu rgyu //
NG0322:398: snur dang nam chung pa sangs rgyu //
NG0322:399: nub ka tho rangs spen pa rgyu /
NG0322:402: glang lug 'brug khyi bzhi yi dbyar dgun 'bring *//
NG0322:403: bco brgyad nyi shu dgu la nam phyed rgyu //
NG0322:404: byi phag gnyis kyi dpyid dbyar 'bring po la //
NG0322:405: bcu bzhi nyi shu drug gi nyi rtse la //
NG0322:406: rta sbrul gnyis kyi ston dpyid ra ba yi //
NG0322:407: yar ngo bcu gsum nyi ma smyur na rgyu //
NG0322:408: bya sprel gnyis kyi dgun dpyid ra ba la //
NG0322:409: mar ngo nyi shu dgu yi nyin phyed na //
NG0322:411: yos gnyis kyi dbyar dgun tha chung la //
NG0322:412: mar ngo bco brgyad nyi ma phyed na rgyu //
NG0322:413: bcu gnyis re re'i ngos la brgyad rgyu ste //
NG0322:414: bzhi brgyad bcu gcig bco lnga bco brgyad dang *//
NG0322:415: nyi shu gnyis te lnga dang dgu rnams kyi //
NG0322:416: srod dang nyi dros nam 'jing nyin phyed dang *//
NG0322:417: nam phyed nyin phyed tho rangs nyi ma myur //
NG0322:418: rim gyi nub nas shar rgyu lho nas byang *//
NG0322:419: skor thabs de bzhin phyogs mtshams khyab par rgyu //
NG0322:420: dpyid ra dbyar 'bring ston zla tha chung gi / tshes gcig bco brgyad bcu bdun gsum la rgyu //
NG0322:421: dbyar ra ston 'bring dgun zla tha chung gi / tshes lnga bcu bdun nyi shu gsum la rgyu //
NG0322:422: dgongs dang tho rangs bya zer tsam na rgyu //
NG0322:423: nam gung nyin gung gnyis kyi yol nas rgyu //
NG0322:424: nam gyi srod dang nyi ma dros nas rgyu //
NG0322:425: nyi ma rtse shar mun sros tsam nas rgyu //
NG0322:426: grib chung srod kyi bar du thams cad rgyu //
NG0322:427: skya rengs shar nas thun gyi klu rigs rgyu //
NG0322:428: las kyi mkha' 'gro nam langs yos bu rgyu //
NG0322:429: rtse shar 'brug rgyu sha ra da sab sbrul //
NG0322:430: dros na rta rgyu phyed na lug / myur na spre'u dgong mo bya //
NG0322:431: srod la khyi rgyu 'jing la phag / gung la byi ba nam chung glang *//
NG0322:432: tho rangs gshed po stag gi dus //
NG0322:434: dur khrod brgyad dang ston pa'i zhabs kyis bcags //
NG0322:435: bya rgod ri dang grub pa thob pa'i sa //
NG0322:436: dur khrod la sogs mkha' 'gro 'dun sa ni //
NG0322:437: dbyar gsum gangs dkar rtse la 'du //
NG0322:438: ston gsum spang snar gong du 'du //
NG0322:439: dgun gsum dgon dmar thang la 'du //
NG0322:440: dpyid gsum chu chu bo'i gzhung yang 'dus slai la 'du //
NG0322:441: tha chung bzhi la 'dun thag gcod //
NG0322:442: dbyar zla tha chung stangs kha klu yis gcod //
NG0322:443: ston zla tha chung stangs kha sa bdag gcod //
NG0322:444: dgun zla tha chung stangs kha ma mos gcod //
NG0322:445: ston zla tha chung stangs kha btsan la 'dor //
NG0322:446: mkha' 'gro'i rigs kyi rgyu phyogs ni //
NG0322:447: rdo rje mkha' 'gro shar nas nub tu rgyu //
NG0322:448: shugs kyi mkha' 'gro lho nas byang du rgyu //
NG0322:449: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro nub nas shar du rgyu //
NG0322:450: las kyi mkha' 'gro byang nas lho ru rgyu //
NG0322:451: mkha' 'gro mgo brnyan bcu gnyis rgyu phyogs ni //
NG0322:452: dgun ra phag gi mgo can lho ru rgyu //
NG0322:453: 'bring po byi ba'i mgo can nub tu rgyu //
NG0322:454: tha chung glang gi mgo can byang du rgyu //
NG0322:455: dpyid ra stag gi mgo can shar du rgyu //
NG0322:456: 'bring po yos bu'i mgo can lho ru rgyu //
NG0322:457: tha chung 'brug gi mgo can nub tu rgyu //
NG0322:458: dbyar ra sbrul gyi mgo can byang du rgyu //
NG0322:459: 'bring po rta yi mgo can shar du rgyu //
NG0322:460: tha chung lug gi mgo can lho ru rgyu //
NG0322:461: ston ra spre'u'i mgo can nub tu rgyu //
NG0322:462: 'bring po bya yi mgo can gong bzhin rgyu //
NG0322:463: tha chung khyi yi mgo can shar du rgyu //
NG0322:464: btsan btsun dmu bdud gangs gsum rtsibs la rgyu //
NG0322:465: ma yams sman gsum tha chung rtsibs la rgyu //
NG0322:466: sa bdag klu srin sa yi sbug la rgyu //
NG0322:467: thams cad dus gcig rgyu ba @#//
NG0322:469: byi rta dpyid 'bring po'i bco lnga las //
NG0322:470: glang lug dpyid ston tha chung nyi shu gnyis //
NG0322:471: stag sprel dbyar dgun ra ba'i tshes brgyad la //
NG0322:472: bya yos dbyar dgun 'bring po'i bco lnga la /
NG0322:473: khyi 'brug dbyar dgun tha yi nyi shu gnyis //
NG0322:474: phag sbrul ston dpyid ra ba'i tshes brgyad la //
NG0322:475: dus bzhi zla ba rab 'bring tha chung la //
NG0322:476: ra ba'i tshes drug 'bring po'i nya //
NG0322:477: tha chung bzhi yi nyi shu drug / bar snang ri rtse sa yi mtshams //
NG0322:478: ris med thams cad rgyu ba yin //
NG0322:479: rdzas ni bsgrub rdzas bskrad rdzas te //
NG0322:480: a mr-i ta ste sha lnga chen po lnga //
NG0322:481: bdug spos rin chen me tog sna tshogs dang *//
NG0322:482: 'bru dang shing thog gcan zan gdug pa'i sha / skyur dang 'o ma mkhris pa tsha sman dang *//
NG0322:483: g.yu rgod gser sha slub bu sha yi rigs //
NG0322:484: bskrad pa btsan btsun dmu bdud ma yams sman //
NG0322:485: sa bdag klu srin bgegs chen phal pa rnams //
NG0322:486: gsur chen 'gar sta'i khu bas thabs kyis bskrad //
NG0322:487: ra dang ku ku+u ra yi khu bas bskrad //
NG0322:488: ma gi rtsi dang bse yi shing gis bskrad //
NG0322:489: gang bsrung ba la sbyar ba'i gu gul byugs //
NG0322:490: las dang dus su+u 'dzom pa ni //
NG0322:491: las kyi dbang gis dus su 'dzom pa dang *//
NG0322:492: thabs dang man ngag shes pas 'dzom pa'o //
NG0322:494: man ngag thabs kyis myur du 'grub pa dang *//
NG0322:495: ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas 'grub pa'o //
NG0322:496: dus tshod rnams ni gong du bstan pa'o //
NG0322:497: rdzu'aphrul la yang rnam pa gsum yod de //
NG0322:499: rang bzhin byin rlab thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul te //
NG0322:500: rang bzhin gcig la sna tshogs sprul pa'o //
NG0322:501: byin rlabs me 'bar dud pa 'thul ba'o //
NG0322:502: thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul thun mong dngos grub rnams //
NG0322:503: sgrib shing nyid dang rdzu+u ba dang *//
NG0322:504: rdzu+u ba lha yi nga rgyal lo //
NG0322:505: ma mo'i sgrib shing dur khrod rdzas //
NG0322:506: kyung ka khu byug dang ru bdud kyi shing *//
NG0322:507: wa khrag byang chub sems ni btsan rigs shing */
NG0322:508: khwa sgrom ma gi'i rtsi ni klu yi shing *//
NG0322:509: 'ug pa srin bya'i dang ru the'u rang shing *//
NG0322:510: de rnams gcig tu sbyar na mi la sgribs //
NG0322:511: 'khrugs pa'i rtags ni drug yod de //
NG0322:512: nyi ma zla ba 'chi ba dang *//
NG0322:513: dus min pa yi rlung byung dang *//
NG0322:514: sgra dang 'od dang sa 'gul drug / 'di rnams mkha' 'gro 'khrugs na 'byung *//
NG0322:515: mi 'dod 'bras bu byung na nyams pa'i rtags //
NG0322:516: bcol ba dus su med na chad pa'i rtags //
NG0322:517: de byung 'khrugs na zhing gis bcos //
NG0322:518: nyams pa rnams ni tshogs kyis bskang *//
NG0322:519: chad pa thams cad mdos kyis bzlog / las kyi
NG0322:520: mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud chen po las sgrub pa'i thabs
NG0322:521: don gyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o ///
NG0322:522: / de nas dpal chen bka' yi bsdus don ni //
NG0322:523: yul dang rgyu srang rigs dang dus tshod sngags //
NG0322:524: brda' dang las tshogs blta ba bstan pa'o //
NG0322:525: rnal 'byor gnyis med dpal dang mnyam pa yi //
NG0322:526: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa yul zhes @#//
NG0322:528: byang chub sems la rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:529: rtsa la shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:530: drod la chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:531: dbugs la las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu //
NG0322:533: rigs ni mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma gsum //
NG0322:534: dpal chen bka' yi dus tshod ni //
NG0322:535: gang la mos pa'i rgyu dus gang du bstan //
NG0322:536: dpal chen bka' yi sngags ni 'di lta ste //
NG0322:537: om shri badzra shri he ru ka hum phat /
NG0322:539: dz+wa la sa ma ba ra hum /
NG0322:541: ma ha kro ng+ha kro d+hi sar+b+ba dush+tan /
NG0322:542: dz+wa ya ni bya a mu ka s+ye /
NG0322:543: sarba pa pam karma a ba ra na nan shin+tam ku ru /
NG0322:544: ka ya tsit+tan ta byi pa tsa le ba pa tsa le ba /
NG0322:545: pe le ba pe le ba /
NG0322:546: a kar sha ya a kar sha ya /
NG0322:550: bya ng+hi pi sha dur ni mit+ta sarba a mam ga ya nan /
NG0322:551: a ra ma rash+ta gats+tsha sh+ta /
NG0322:553: sarba gra ha b+h+yi ga tsit+ta rak+ta a kar sha ya a kar sha ya /
NG0322:554: da ra ya da ra ya /
NG0322:555: a gad ta ya a gad ta ya /
NG0322:557: badzra sr-im kha le na ba na bad ya /
NG0322:558: mo ha ya mo ha ya /
NG0322:559: ku ru pa shang ku ru /
NG0322:560: badzra mud ka re na dan te /
NG0322:562: ha na ha na b+h+yi rtsi /
NG0322:566: pha ng+ha ya pha ng+ha ya /
NG0322:567: ts+tshe da ya ts+tshe da ya /
NG0322:568: da ha na ma ra ya ma ra ya /
NG0322:570: b+hish+mam ku ru pa ra bid ng+h+wan tshe ng+ha ya man ta krit+ya ni ka kho ra ni na /
NG0322:571: pra yo ga da sha pa la nan /
NG0322:572: ba la me la ka sarba bi s+pho ta ya /
NG0322:573: sarba de tsa nan bya pa ta ya /
NG0322:575: badzra he he ru ru ka sarba dak+ki yo gi /
NG0322:579: shri ba na te dza s+ya /
NG0322:580: a yu she ba la s+ya /
NG0322:581: sarba sam b+ho ga push+tim ku ru /
NG0322:582: yo gi ma ha sa ng+ha ka rak+sha rak+sha swa ha /
NG0322:583: brda' ni lus ngag yid de dkrug pa'o //
NG0322:584: las kyi tshogs ni gnyis 'byung ste //
NG0322:585: bud med gsad dang dus las zlog par byed //
NG0322:586: dbang dang dgug pa bsad pa bskrad //
NG0322:587: tshe srung ba dang bgegs bzlog pa'o //
NG0322:588: rnal 'byor lha dang gnyis med pas //
NG0322:589: gnas dang 'dun sar bsnyen pa la sogs bya //
NG0322:590: drod tshad yod pas rgyu srang sa ru gsad //
NG0322:591: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu+u na dbang du bya //
NG0322:592: las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu+u na dgug par bya //
NG0322:593: chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu+u na gsad par bya //
NG0322:594: shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu na bskrad par bya //
NG0322:595: de bzhin dus rnams gang la bab pa'i tshe //
NG0322:596: rang rang sngags kyis mjug la gdags pa ni //
NG0322:598: ba sham ku ru shr-id kha le na ban+d+ha ya /
NG0322:604: ma ra ya ma ra ya /
NG0322:607: u tsh+tsha na ya a tra ma ti di sha gats+tsha gats+tsha //
NG0322:608: sngags rnams mgo 'jug a+om phat gdags par bya //
NG0322:609: tshe srung bgegs bzlog 'dod pas gtor ma btang *//
NG0322:610: gang la ster ba de yi sngags mjug la //
NG0322:611: a mu ka s+ye ka ya tsit+ta /
NG0322:612: pu n+ya s+ya dz+nya na s+ya /
NG0322:614: a yu she ba la s+ya /
NG0322:616: ka re na karma ku ru zhes brjod pa'o //
NG0322:617: lha yi dbang po 'di lta ste /
NG0322:618: rdo rje sems dpa' mkha' 'gro nyid 'gyur te //
NG0322:619: bud med bde ba'i stobs kyis sdig pa 'joms //
NG0322:620: phyogs bcu'i mkha' la gshegs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NG0322:621: mtshan nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba las //
NG0322:622: sgyu ma lta bur 'phrul ba mdzad //
NG0322:623: kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa 'di //
NG0322:624: mya ngan 'das la mi gnas pa //
NG0322:626: snang ba de la rang bzhin med //
NG0322:627: sems kyi rang bzhin dngos ma grub //
NG0322:628: dngos po'i ro ni kun dang bral //
NG0322:629: blo dang ldan pas mkha' ltar bsgom //
NG0322:630: smig sgyu rmi lam lta bur ni //
NG0322:631: mkhas pas rang rig rtsal gyis ni //
NG0322:632: sbyor ba'i mtha' drug bsam gtan bya'o //
NG0322:633: dang po gleng gzhi'i gnas rgyu dang *//
NG0322:634: phyag rgya sngags dang bsam gtan dang *//
NG0322:635: de bzhin la sogs cho ga'i thabs //
NG0322:636: de bzhin 'dod pa'i bstan bya rnams //
NG0322:637: lha khyod la ni ngas bstan to //
NG0322:639: 'jig rten pas kyang nye byed de //
NG0322:640: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis srung bar byed //
NG0322:642: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi stan las langs te /
NG0322:643: lha ma srin sde brgyad dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'gu ste /
NG0322:644: thams cad kyis mchod pa chen pos mchod de /
NG0322:645: dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad du bstod do //
NG0322:647: mthu chen kun las khyad du 'phags //
NG0322:648: thugs rje drag pos gdug pa 'joms mdzad lha //
NG0322:649: ljags ser spyan bgrad mche gtsigs pad+ma'i gdan //
NG0322:650: thugs rtags rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la bstod //
NG0322:652: de dag thams cad rang gi gnas su 'khod par 'gyur ro //
NG0322:653: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so //
NG0322:654: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shan ting gar+b+ha dang */
